summary: Complete Boethiah's quest without betraying a friend.
descriptionHtml:
[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24224][img]  http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/24224-4-1347814951.png[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22818][img] http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/24224-1-1347814950.png[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21700][img] http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/24224-2-1347814951.png[/img][/url]


This mod allows you to complete Boethiah's quest without betraying a friend. When you're told to bring a friend to the altar, simply activate the altar yourself. Boethiah will recognized (and disdain) your noble heart, but will go ahead and provide a victim for you. The rest of the quest proceeds as normal.
[img] http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/22818-1-1345578897.png[/img]

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002744[/img]
I was inspired to create this mod after playing through and loving Kevin Kidder's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21700]House of Horrors Alternate Ending mod.[/url] If you're into doing Daedric quests as a good guy, you should definitely check his mod out.

[img] http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/15827-1-1349804517.png[/img]
For an Italian translation, see [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27607]this mod by  Siegfriedm.[/url]

Also, if you like this mod, be sure to check out my other mods by clicking [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1398716]here[/url] and clicking on the files tab. :D

Thank you!
[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002745[/img]
Merge the 'Data' folder with the 'Data' folder in your Skyrim folder.  
Don't forget to check on the esp: AK- Boethiah Alternate.esp

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002741[/img]
This mod only changes one vanilla script: DA02PillarScript. Therefore, it should be extremely compatible.

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002740[/img]
None at this point.

[img]http://z13.invisionfree.com/IceburgsSkyrim/index.php?act=Attach&type=post&id=22002748[/img]
I am currently not posting any mods on Steam Workshop. If you see one of my mods on Steam Workshop, please report the file to me. 
Thank :D
author: Iceburg
